contents.main: Your Beauty starts in your Heart not in your Mirror.
Be like a diamond precious and rare, Not like a stone found everywhere.
Beauty without grace, is a body without a soul.
No beautiful woman was always the same. She has known pain and she has let it help her grow.
People are beautiful, not in their looks, or the way they dress up, neither their personalities, nor the way they talk, but just the way they are.
Sometimes the seasons get a little confusing, but they are still beautiful.
